Rulings.Edison:
●Goddess of Whim's effect is an Ignition Effect. It can only be used once per turn, during your Main Phase.
●Goddess of Whim's total ATK is doubled or halved, including any Equip Cards, etc.
Rulings.Tengu:
●Goddess of Whim's effect is an Ignition Effect. It can only be used once per turn, during your Main Phase.
●Goddess of Whim's total ATK is doubled or halved, including any Equip Cards, etc.
Rulings.Goat:
● Can the effect of “Goddess of Whim” be used more than once per turn? 
A: You may only activate the effect of Goddess of Whim once per turn and only during a MP.
